name: Super RocketBall 3 Football
description:
Super RocketBall 3 - Real Football Multiplayer is futuristic Sports with action packed soccer rocket car game.

Soccer meets driving once again in the long-awaited, physics-based sequel to the Super Rocketball - Multiplayer with over 50 Million downloads across all platform

In this highly advanced football game ”BATTLE FOR GOAL” is the only formula to win. This action packed game brings the worlds best players into the football field. Get in your favorite car and go out on the soccer field like a rocket to hit the ball.

Using an advanced physics system to simulate realistic interactions, Super RocketBall 3 relies on weight and velocity to give all the players a complete sense of intuitive control in this unbelievable, high-tech all new aera of football. A futuristic Sports-Action game, Super RocketBall 3, equips world wide players with rocket booster-rigged vehicles that can be smashed into balls for incredible goals, aerials or epic saves across multiple, highly-detailed arenas. Perform AERIALS and AERIAL GOALS like never before in this franchise.

This action packed game brings the worlds best players into the football field. Get in your favorite car and go out on the soccer field like a rocket to hit the ball.


UNIQUE GAME FEATURES :
* 8 High detail Super Power Rockets cars with realistic handling
* 3 Amazingly fantastic stadiums with unique level design
* Simple and user friendly user interface
* Wide variety of car customisation including car decals, wheels, boosters, explosions, tails etc
* Practice mode available to strengthen players ability
* Perform AERIALS and AERIAL GOALS like never before
* Auto Reconnect Feature will allow you to continue game after being interrupted by phone call or network failure.
* Quick Chat option available to convey messages one just single tap

UNIQUE MULTIPLAYER FEATURES :
* Join high speed servers from all over the world
* Ability to create private and public rooms
* Cross platform connectivity
* Live chat in lobby and in gameplay
* Play with your social media friends and connect to them in single touch
* Create your clan and challenge other clans


This game is a must play for everyone who likes to play unique football games, challenging soccer games or even car driving or car battle.
So just TEAM UP with the best players around the globe and DOMINATE the battle ground.
